participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Emily has a creative spirit and enjoys introspective activities.
participant_1.background: I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast. I enjoy writing for long periods of time. I am an excellent student. I am not a morning person, but my pets always wake me up with a smile. I remember reading books in the car with my dad when we were going on long road trips.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and humorous, Jake is a sociable person who loves connecting with others through storytelling and laughter.
participant_2.background: I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town. Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab. My major was American literature and education. I love going to comedy clubs. I'm a clumsy artist who is trying to find my way in the world.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Hi, I am great! I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
That sounds like a nice break. I am an excellent student and enjoy writing for long periods of time.
I also love to read. I remember reading books in the car with my dad when we were going on long road trips.
That is a good memory. I am not a morning person, but my pets always wake me up with a smile.
My black lab helps me stay sane during the crazy Toronto summers.
What is your favorite thing about Toronto?
I have never been to Toronto. I would love to see a show at a comedy club there.
You should definitely come visit. I am sure you would love it.
